instruction: Explain why water is essential for human beings.
output: Water is essential for human beings because it is one of the most important elements for survival. It is required for digestion, respiration, circulation, temperature regulation and many other bodily functions. It transports oxygen, vitamins, minerals and other essential nutrients to the cells and tissues in the body. In addition, water helps to keep the skin hydrated and to flush out toxins, making it an important contributor to overall health and wellbeing.
